1.png.description: The green pot plant is visible and slightly to the left. Moving straight will bring the drone closer to the plant while keeping it in view.

2.png.description: The green pot plant is partially visible on the left edge of the image. Moving left will bring it more into view and center it in the frame.

3.png.description: The green pot plant is visible and centered on the table. Moving straight will bring the drone closer to the target.

4.png.description: The green pot plant is clearly visible and centered in the image. Moving straight will bring the drone closer to the target.

5.png.description: The green pot plant is partially visible on the left edge of the image. Moving left will bring it more into view and center it in the frame.

6.png.description: The green pot plant is clearly visible, takes up a significant portion of the image, and appears extremely close with clear texture and depth details. No further movement is necessary.
